content.text:
# 33rd Hundred Flowers Awards

The 33rd Hundred Flowers Awards was held on September 24, 2016 in Tangshan, Hebei province.
Awards and nominations

|-

!Winning film
!Nominees

|The Dead End
|Mojin: The Lost LegendMonster HuntGoodbye Mr. LoserWolf Warriors
|}

!Winning film

|Wuershan
|Mojin: The Lost Legend
|* Guan Hu for Mr. Six * Peter Chan for Dearest * Wu Jing for Wolf Warriors * Raman Hui for Monster Hunt
|}

|}
